Posts.Content: On Apr 08, 2014 10:53 PM mnwyrkmaria wrote: It has been almost 3 years since I had my chemo. It has taken me a long time for me to grow my hair back.Â  My hair has grown a few inches on the back of my head, but the front of my head look almost bald. How can I grow all of my hair back. Please help me. I am very depressed about my hair. Thank you. I am in the same boat as you. I am currently struggling with what I am now. Maybe some one will respond with a solution. In the meanwhile I'm going to try what a lady suggested above.
Posts.Title: 2 years after chemo, my hair has not grown back
